content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"], connection points at positions (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0), status NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, a fluid box holding ~189 units of water at temperature 15, connection points at positions (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), fluid_system [65350], and steam output at position (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) operating with fluid_system [65350] and a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5), status WORKING.
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  - PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 65350, status WORKING.
  - PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 65349, status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 65362, status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 65361, status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 65357, status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 65366, status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 65365, status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 65368, status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 65369, status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 65370, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure both source and target connection points are unobstructed, lie within the effective range, and share matching fluid system assignments.

• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that target tiles are unoccupied before attempting to place any entity.

• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use precise placement attributes during position determination to avoid type-related errors.

• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Verify that candidate pipe groups possess the correct fluid system identifiers and are situated within the required search radius.

• Steam Engine Repositioning Failures:
  - Repeated repositioning attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs (64022, 64106, 64188, 64272, 64354, 64438, 64520, 64604) previously failed.
  - Recent attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs (64686, 64770, 64852, 64936, 65018, 65102, 65184, 65268) within a 5-tile radius of (-5.5, 19.5) also yielded no valid results. Consider expanding the search radius or adjusting the pipeline network configuration to ensure a matching connection.

• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor fuel levels diligently and replenish boiler fuel promptly to prevent operational shutdown.

• General Connection Strategies:
  - Assess environmental constraints and verify inventory levels prior to executing repositioning or pipeline attachment actions.
